archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0609
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to select the payment frequency that works best for me - weekly, fortnightly, 4 weekly, monthly, annually?

properties.value: Details to be discussed internally between Dallas and Katie. Maybe this requirement is not needed anymore. [Jared] It is needed, as billing could be subscription or post-paid for some businesses

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
